decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent's life total. By using cheap, efficient creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Voldaren Epicure along with powerful burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Experimental Synthesizer provide additional threats and ways to generate value. This deck's strategy is to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game in order to secure a quick victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent through aggressive creature and removal spells. The deck also includes a mix of card draw and graveyard interaction to maintain card advantage and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Additionally, the deck utilizes a variety of mana fixing and lands to ensure consistency in casting spells. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient threats and disruption while maintaining a solid mana base for consistency.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with low-cost creatures and efficient removal spells. The deck aims to maintain a steady flow of creatures to the battlefield while disrupting opponent's game plan with removal spells like Tragic Slip and Snuff Out. Reaping the Graves provides the opportunity to return multiple creatures from the graveyard to hand, allowing for additional pressure. The deck also includes enablers like Mortician Beetle and Serrated Scorpion to benefit from sacrificing creatures. With a low mana curve and aggressive strategy, this deck aims to win swiftly and decisively.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly and aggressively dealing damage to the opponent through efficient creatures and burn spells. With a combination of low-cost creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and end the game swiftly. Additionally, cards like Faithless Looting and Grab the Prize help maintain card advantage and selective card draw, while Alms of the Vein provides additional reach for finishing off opponents. The deck also includes some utility lands like Bojuka Bog for graveyard hate and Jagged Barrens for mana fixing.
